BR_text.BRsummary: Windows debug build with ninja generator fails
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
 
 The Windows debug build with ninja as generator fails. Probably because of the change in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/oneapi-src/oneDNN/commit/4e484f17d334ddf7f064fa48abf27c0d61042840>4e484f1</denchmark-link>
  as the /bigobj flag isn't set for cpu_engine.cpp.
 As a consequence I have the following build error:
 src\cpu\cpu_engine.cpp : fatal error C1128: number of sections exceeded object file format limit: compile with /bigobj
 <denchmark-h:h1>Version</denchmark-h>
 
 Problem occurs with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/oneapi-src/oneDNN/commit/d9452ba4c34dc5654cad38b68c81fb7c8e3f6122>d9452ba</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-h:h1>Environment</denchmark-h>
 
 Build on Windows x64 with VS2017
 <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 Configure the debug build with any other Generator than Visual Studio. E.g. with -G Ninja and build.
 <denchmark-h:h1>Observed behavior</denchmark-h>
 
 src\cpu\cpu_engine.cpp : fatal error C1128: number of sections exceeded object file format limit: compile with /bigobj
 <denchmark-h:h1>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
 
 The build should work without problems.

comments_0.comment_text: JFYI: should be fixed as soon as the fix is promoted from the internal repo.
